# Miss Central African Republic

| type                = Beauty pageant
| headquarters        = Bangui
| location            = Central African Republic
| languages           = French
}}
Miss Central African Republic () is a national beauty pageant in Central African Republic. The current Miss Central African Republic 2024 is Emmanuelle Ngainganazui of Bangui.
History
The Miss Central African Republic pageant is an event held to select the country's beauty representative. The first pageant took place in 2015 but was paused due to unrest in the country. However, in 2018, the pageant was reinstated with the help of the Wagner Group on 9 December 2018, Bangui National Stadium, Bangui, Central African Republic. Miss Russia 2013, Elmira Abdrazakova, was invited to assist in organizing the event.
